projects.title: Room Rental
projects.description: A website where user can register and post room advertisements for rent. It was built for people who want to look for the rooms they want more effectively by filtering with advanced search feature.

projects.title: Course Tracking App
projects.description: A course management app where students can register the courses, teachers can grade the students and admins can manage all the related stuffs.

projects.title: WBGT tracking App
projects.description: An android application that users can check the current and predicted wet bulb globe temperature and alert the users of the risk of heat stroke if the current WBGT is high.

projects.title: Personal Blog App
projects.description: A website where I can write and document the things I've learned
